mapper.select: SELECT r.room_nm, rs.reserve_no, rs.reserve_checkin_date, ( SELECT count(*) FROM tb_company_evaluation c WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} AND c.company_id = #{pageId} AND c.reserve_no = rs.reserve_no ) as evaluationCheck FROM tb_reserve rs JOIN tb_room r ON rs.room_no = r.room_no WHERE rs.person_id = #{memberId} AND r.company_id = #{pageId}

SELECT t.trip_no, t.trip_title, t.trip_start_date, ( SELECT count(*) FROM tb_person_evaluation pe WHERE pe.member_id = #{memberId} AND pe.person_id = #{pageId} AND pe.trip_no = t.trip_no ) as evaluationCheck FROM tb_trip t JOIN tb_group g ON t.trip_no = g.trip_no WHERE g.person_id = #{memberId} AND t.person_id = #{pageId}
